data.title: Charles D. Mann
data.meta_description: Let Linnemann Funeral Homes ease the pain of your suffering. Call our funeral home today in Boone County for more info about our services. (859) 727-1250
data.text:
Charles D. Mann, 70, passed away peacefully surrounded by his family on Saturday February 10, 2024. He retired from the United States Postal Service after 33 years. Charles served in the Military starting in the US Air Force serving from 1971 to 1975 as well as the US Army from 1976 to 1980. Preceded in death by his parents Charles and Hazel Mann, granddaughter Brianna Marie Mann, sister Patricia Daniel, brother Bruce Mann, brother Kevin Mann, niece Shadonna Mann, nephews Noah and Nathan Mann. Survivors include his wife Lourdes Mann, daughter Deanna Mann, son Eric Mann, daughter Jessica Mann, daughter Andrea Mann, brother Steve Mann, brother Leslie Mann, brother Dwight Mann, sister Linda McCormick, sister Tessie Barlow, sister Karen Daniel and sister Lisa Mann. Also surviving are grandchildren Mac Barker, Charlie Wright, Aliza Mann, Logan Mann and Marley Mann. Visitation will be held Friday February 16, 2024 from 5pm to 8pm at Linnemann Funeral Homes 1940 Burlington Pike, Burlington KY 41005. Funeral Service will be held Saturday February 17, 2024 at 10am at the funeral home. Burial will be at New Bethel Cemetery in Verona, KY. In lieu of flowers; memorial contributions can be made to The Ronald McDonald House Charities of Greater Cincinnati 341 Erkenbrecher Ave, Cincinnati, OH 45229. https://apps.rmhcincinnati.org/donate-now Online condolences can be made at www.linnemannfuneralhomes.com

To watch Charlesâ€™ service live, please visit: https://youtube.com/live/qfzjwGXXskY?feature=share
